de.codescape.bitvunit.rule
Interface Rule

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractRule, AlternativeTextForAppletRule, AlternativeTextForAreaOfImageMapRule, AlternativeTextForImageButtonRule, AlternativeTextForImageRule, AlternativeTextForInlineFrameRule, AlternativeTextForLinkedImageRule, AlternativeTextForObjectRule, AnchorsWithoutTargetAttributeRule, AvoidAbstractRoleRule, AvoidBlinkTextRule, AvoidBoldTagRule, AvoidItalicTagRule, AvoidMarqueeTextRule, AvoidMetaRefreshRule, AvoidServerSideImageMapRule, CaptionTextForTableRule, DefinitionListContainsItemsRule, FieldsetContainsLegendRule, HeadingContainsTextRule, HeadingsInCorrectOrderRule, LabelContainsTextRule, LabelForInputFieldRule, LabelForSelectTagRule, LabelForTextareaRule, LabelWithoutFormElementRule, LanguageForHtmlTagRule, OrderedListContainsListItemsRule, TableHeaderContainsTextRule, TableHeaderForTableColumnRule, TitleForAbbreviationTagRule, TitleForAcronymTagRule, TitleForFrameRule, TitleForInlineFrameRule, TitleForPageRule, UniqueLabelForFormElementRule, UnorderedListContainsListItemsRule
public interface Rule

Interface that must be implemented by all rules that should be checked with this framework. You should always extend AbstractRule which gives you some convenience functionality instead of implementing this interface directly.

Author:
Stefan Glase

Method Summary

          Applies that rule to the given HtmlPage and returns all Violations of that rule.
